programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2024)
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Dan Bourchier in the morning to bring you whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2024)
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the days top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Bean There, Done That
programme.desc: Time to spill the beans: Adam, Australias sweetheart Osher Guunsberg and acclaimed chef Tom Walton are saying "bean there, done that" to a few bean recipes.

programme.title: Bangladeshi
programme.desc: Arka takes actors Rahel Romahn and Thuso Lekwape to explore the sights, sounds and flavours of the thriving Bangladeshi strip in Lakemba.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Cyclone S1
programme.desc: Cyclones burst upon Australias tropical coast bringing torrential rain and destruction, while ancient rain forests and coral reefs are destroyed. Aaron Pedersen explains how these ecosystems have evolved and adapted.

programme.title: Miriam Margolyes: Australia Unmasked S1
programme.desc: Starting in Tasmania, Miriam Margolyes is confronted with the complexities of Tasmanias rich history. She navigates these confronting themes all while meeting those still fighting for a fair go.

programme.title: Fran Kelly
programme.desc: After 17 years of early morning alarms, Fran Kelly said goodbye as RN Breakfast host in 2021. She spoke to Barrie Cassidy about her love of radio, what the world looks like before dawn and how shes seen Australia change.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2024)
programme.desc: Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe OBrien (2024)
programme.desc: Joe OBrien brings you a comprehensive summary of the days events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on whats going on.

programme.title: Field To Feast S1
programme.desc: Considered a tough nut to crack, Thanh explores how chestnuts are grown, cooked, and enjoyed. From shaking a chestnut trees to demonstrating some of the best ways to cook this winter delight.

programme.title: ABC National News (2024)
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the days stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe OBrien.

Sarah Ferguson presents Australias premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight (2024)

programme.desc: Pertemuan pertama Emil dengan Gaby di dalam bas, seorang gadis manis misteri yang dia panggil Sweet Creatures. Sejak itu Emil berusaha mencari keberadaan Gaby, yang tinggal bersama datuknya.

programme.title: Expose Mistik: Kisah Seram
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah seram yang sangat mistik.

programme.title: Carca Marba
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Penjara Abah
programme.desc: Natasha merupakan seorang kanak-kanak pintar namun dinafikan hak belajar oleh ayahnya. Dengan bantuan Cikgu Atok, Natasha berjaya bersekolah namun ada harga yang harus dibayar.

programme.title: Wak Sayang Lu
programme.desc: Kisah kehidupan jurutol Lila dan Tipah yang suka bergurau kasar ditambah pula dengann kehadiran Jack yang mengecohkan lagi suasana.

programme.title: Akak Akak Sangat
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara mengenai topik- topik hangat yang akan diperbincangkan dalam keadaan yang kasual.

programme.title: Bas Stop!
programme.desc: Selebriti dan pelawak mengalami sendiri situasi sebenar kehidupan seharian pemandu teksi, pembaiki kasut, penyanyi jalanan dan pelbagai lagi dari sudut komikal.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: Program berkonsepkan food-travelogue dimana 13 selebriti tempatan akan pulang ke kampung halaman masing-masing untuk berkongsi makanan tradisi, makanan unik serta juadah yang terkenal di negeri mereka.

programme.title: MLM Tergempak 2018
programme.desc: Saksikan aksi terbaik finalist Maharaja Lawak Mega 2018

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato AC Mizal, rancangan latah paling kecoh kini kembali dengan musim terbaru. Saksikan kaki latah popular seperti PS Mansur, Eida Moin and Nazia Mustafar menggeletek anda seisi keluarga.

programme.title: RSVP Aku Datang
programme.desc: RSVP menonjolkan pelbagai acara dari berbagai kaum diMalaysia dari majlis perkahwinan, majlis aqiqah hinggalah ke majlis Ponggal dan banyak lagi.

programme.title: Chef S.O.S
programme.desc: Masak pelbagai jenis hidangan dengan bantuan tetamu setiap minggu melalui panggilan video.

programme.title: Komediri S2
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan stand up comedy yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Tele Berkembar
programme.desc: Saksikan telefilem komedi yang bakal mencuitkan hati anda.

programme.title: Setem
programme.desc: Dua sahabat pencuri terpaksa berebut dengan pencuri-pencuri lain untuk mencuri setem bernilai empat juta dolar.

programme.title: Aunty Reporting For Duty
programme.desc: Saksikan geng mak-mak melakukan cabaran yang menguji fizikal dan minda mereka. Mampukah geng mak-mak menyelesaikan misi yang diberi?

programme.title: Tanya Sama Pokok
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehidupan di sebuah kampung moden yang sudah semakin terdedah dengan kemodenan tetapi dalam waktu yang sama masih mengekalkan ciri-ciri hidup berkampung.

programme.title: Lawak Minggu Ini
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi pentas yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Buka Kedai : Now In Tokyo
programme.desc: Buka Kedai: Now in Tokyo menampilkan 4 selebriti Malaysia yang terdiri daripada Nabila Huda, Shashic, Leona dan Eric. Mereka bakal melakukan misi berniaga di Tokyo, Jepun.

programme.title: Jangan Buat Hal
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat Nana Mahazan bersama selebriti popular melatah sambil bermain permainan menarik dan kumpulan manakah yang digelar juara bagi setiap episod.

programme.title: Semanis Fondant
programme.desc: Trend masa kini pembuatan kek dibawa ke kaca tv mengikut tema unik dan kreatif. Pasukan Semanis Fondant cuba menepati kehendak pelanggan dalam apa jua cara.

programme.title: Kampung Latah Kena Kuarantin
programme.desc: Ajin adalah pekerja di syarikat pelancongan di Kampung Latah Permai. Gelagatnya menghiburkan penduduk kampung dan pelancong. Satu hari, kampung itu dilanda sindrom "melatah" dan menjadi tidak terkawal.

programme.desc: First constructed in the 1930s, the West Side Line - an elevated viaduct section of the New York Central Railroad - was abandoned in the 1980s. But since 2009 its been totally revitalised.

programme.title: Bolivia - The Choro Trek
programme.desc: The El Choro Trail starts in the lowland jungles of western Bolivia and finishes on the vast Alti-plano plateau that covers much of the country. The journey tracks a historical trading route used by locals for centuries.

programme.desc: Dog and Pug meet two hapless superheroes trying to outdo each other to save the city.

programme.title: Flower Power

programme.title: Its time to visit the library
programme.desc: When JoJo runs out of story-books to read, she visits the Library with Gran Gran and gets her own library card! JoJo learns all about the Library and discovers how amazing it is!

programme.title: Christmas Swim
programme.desc: The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Easter
programme.desc: Its the night before Easter and Bluey and Bingo are worried the Easter bunny is going to forget about them like last year.

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: The Breakfast Badge
programme.desc: Tags feeling grumpy because he didnt eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: The Opposites Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: The Radio Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: The Northern Lights, Finland
programme.desc: Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitchs Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.title: Celery
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Celery performing Were Here to Grow - if he manages to squeeze himself out of the dressing room on time.

programme.title: Plum
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Plum performing the Sugar Plum Fairy Bounce and attempting to do not one, not two, but three pirouettes in midair!

programme.title: How to be a Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato shows the Grape Kids a Supertato training film, but Evil Pea sneaks in to take over Tato Tower. The Grape Kids use the rug launcher to eject Evil Pea out of the tower.

programme.title: The Throne Thief
programme.desc: Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Chilli are playing when, suddenly, they hear a scream and discover an upset Evil Pea in her freezer. Her throne has been stolen! Who would do such a thing?

programme.title: Swap Places
programme.desc: The Teletubbies swap places in the Tubby Car and drive to the Hidey Hup. They swap places again on the Tubby Uppy Downy before going up and down.

programme.title: Bath
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say bath and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different baths - a baby bath, a bubble bath, a bird bath and even a banana bath!

programme.title: The Floor is Bananas
programme.desc: Helping Hand builds a banana-themed obstacle course. But when Phoebe becomes competitive, she must work with her team to make it over the finish line together.

programme.title: Felix Finds His Voice
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy the monster hears a chirping songbird outside his window, but he cant understand what the bird is saying. He goes to OKIDO to find out why all things cant just simply talk the same.

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Too Hot
programme.desc: Its too hot for Nelly and Nora, if only they could make it rain...

programme.title: Dog Loves Heroes
programme.desc: Dog and Pug meet two hapless superheroes trying to outdo each other to save the city.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Monty tries to get his family to play football with him, but they are all too busy doing flower-related activities.

programme.title: Its time to visit the library
programme.desc: When JoJo runs out of story-books to read, she visits the Library with Gran Gran and gets her own library card! JoJo learns all about the Library and discovers how amazing it is!

programme.title: Christmas Swim
programme.desc: The Heelers gather for a classic Aussie Christmas. Bluey gets a new teddy and introduces him to the whole family, but the family play too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

programme.title: Easter
programme.desc: Its the night before Easter and Bluey and Bingo are worried the Easter bunny is going to forget about them like last year.

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: The Breakfast Badge
programme.desc: Tags feeling grumpy because he didnt eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: The Opposites Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: The Radio Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: The Northern Lights, Finland
programme.desc: Ubercorn is excited to see the Northern Lights, but Glitchs Grunge-Grimbler covers them with smoke.

programme.title: Celery
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Celery performing Were Here to Grow - if he manages to squeeze himself out of the dressing room on time.

programme.title: Plum
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Plum performing the Sugar Plum Fairy Bounce and attempting to do not one, not two, but three pirouettes in midair!

programme.title: How to be a Supertato
programme.desc: Supertato shows the Grape Kids a Supertato training film, but Evil Pea sneaks in to take over Tato Tower. The Grape Kids use the rug launcher to eject Evil Pea out of the tower.

programme.title: The Throne Thief
programme.desc: Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Chilli are playing when, suddenly, they hear a scream and discover an upset Evil Pea in her freezer. Her throne has been stolen! Who would do such a thing?

programme.title: Swap Places
programme.desc: The Teletubbies swap places in the Tubby Car and drive to the Hidey Hup. They swap places again on the Tubby Uppy Downy before going up and down.

programme.title: Bath
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say bath and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different baths - a baby bath, a bubble bath, a bird bath and even a banana bath!

programme.title: The Floor is Bananas
programme.desc: Helping Hand builds a banana-themed obstacle course. But when Phoebe becomes competitive, she must work with her team to make it over the finish line together.

programme.title: Felix Finds His Voice
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy the monster hears a chirping songbird outside his window, but he cant understand what the bird is saying. He goes to OKIDO to find out why all things cant just simply talk the same.

programme.title: Bedroom
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Obstacle Course
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: The Getting Ready Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: The Imagination Badge
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: The Recipe Badge
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they arent sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Caernarfon Castle, Wales
programme.desc: How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xulis treasured Academy Ace flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Mount Rushmore, USA
programme.desc: When the Grimbots add Glitchs face to those of the presidents on Mount Rushmore they cause a major mudslide.

programme.title: Bus
programme.desc: During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: When Mum and Dad describe a made-up world where they can relax without the girls, Bluey and Bingo decide to burst into their fantasy and chase them down. How will Mum and Dad escape?

programme.title: Andy and the Baby Alligators
programme.desc: When Andy inadvertently destroys an audio tape of a recording that Mr Hammond made of a baby alligator, its up to him to replace it.

programme.title: Woodlice
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about woodlice.

programme.title: Sandcastle Squish
programme.desc: Seaweed arrives on deck playing a new game called Sandcastle Squish on his console, but Captain Captain takes it off him and quickly becomes obsessed with it, neglecting her captains duties. Its up to the pirates to try and get her to stop playing the game.

programme.title: The Philosophy Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels think about lifes big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: The Future Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Forbidden City, China
programme.desc: Some runaway Chinese drums roll towards The Forbidden City. Can the Go Jetters stop them?

programme.title: The Dead Sea, Middle East
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are relaxing by the Dead Sea when Grandmaster Glitch causes a catastrophe.

programme.title: Chucklesome Trucks
programme.desc: When Rebecca works with the Troublesome Trucks, everyone expects the worst, but she defies everyones expectations and has a very amusing day.

programme.title: Constable Quack
programme.desc: After their snacks go missing, Sergeant Sarah and Constable Quack are on the trail of a biscuit burglar.

programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say monkey and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of monkeys - a furry monkey, a swinging monkey, a jumping monkey and a funky monkey!

programme.title: The First Big Camping Adventure
programme.desc: The friends are excited to go on a camping trip, but Zip is nervous about being in a dark place away from home. He must try to overcome his fears.

programme.title: OKIDO in Bloom
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. The sky is full of big grey rain clouds in the real world. Messy watches his sandcastle outside get washed away by the pouring rain. Why does it have to rain? He competes in the OKIDO flower competition and finds out why.

programme.title: Obstacle Course
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mums word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why its important not to break them.

programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: The Family Photo Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: The Breakfast Badge
programme.desc: Tags feeling grumpy because he didnt eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: The Opposites Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: Amazon Rain Forest, South America
programme.desc: Glitch wants a picnic so he stops the rain in the rainforest, upsetting the tree frogs.

programme.title: Pineapple
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its the magical Pineapple attempting to perform a very difficult magic trick with the help of Kiwi.

programme.title: Celery
programme.desc: Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, its Celery performing Were Here to Grow - if he manages to squeeze himself out of the dressing room on time.

programme.title: The Throne Thief
programme.desc: Supertato, Carrot, Broccoli and Chilli are playing when, suddenly, they hear a scream and discover an upset Evil Pea in her freezer. Her throne has been stolen! Who would do such a thing?

programme.title: Broccoli Alone
programme.desc: Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Noise
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are trying very hard not to make any noise. Then they make as much noise as possible during the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say monkey and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of monkeys - a furry monkey, a swinging monkey, a jumping monkey and a funky monkey!

programme.title: The First Big Camping Adventure
programme.desc: The friends are excited to go on a camping trip, but Zip is nervous about being in a dark place away from home. He must try to overcome his fears.

programme.title: OKIDO in Bloom
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. The sky is full of big grey rain clouds in the real world. Messy watches his sandcastle outside get washed away by the pouring rain. Why does it have to rain? He competes in the OKIDO flower competition and finds out why.

programme.title: Obstacle Course
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Promises
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mums word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why its important not to break them.

programme.title: The Size Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: The Getting Ready Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: The Imagination Badge
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: The Great Barrier Reef, Australia
programme.desc: The team dives into action as Glitchs treasure hunt endangers the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Caernarfon Castle, Wales
programme.desc: How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xulis treasured Academy Ace flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Bus
programme.desc: During a game of bus, passenger Mum is too shy to tell bus driver Dad that she secretly loves him, until she gets some help from the Grannies.

programme.title: Andy and the Weedy Sea Dragon
programme.desc: When Andy finds a newly hatched weedy sea dragon, will he manage to snap the perfect photo of it and make it back before the opening of the exhibition?

programme.title: Stinging Nettles
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about stinging nettles.

programme.title: Wing It Now
programme.desc: A carrier seagull delivery service for shipwrecked pirates, called Wing It Now, has been launched. Captain Captain, Sandy and Seaweed each choose something for delivery.

programme.title: The Sharing Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between them

programme.title: The Philosophy Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels think about lifes big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: The Future Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: The Wieliczka Salt Mine, Poland
programme.desc: The Go Jetters must save the famous salt statues in the Wieliczka Salt mine

programme.title: The Forbidden City, China
programme.desc: Some runaway Chinese drums roll towards The Forbidden City. Can the Go Jetters stop them?

programme.title: Heart of Gold
programme.desc: Tobys passengers cant stop making fun of him, that is until he discovers two villains trying to steal King Godreds crown.

programme.title: Arcade Dance Off
programme.desc: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.title: Constable Quack
programme.desc: After their snacks go missing, Sergeant Sarah and Constable Quack are on the trail of a biscuit burglar.

programme.title: Windmill Girl
programme.desc: When the wind blows fast Nora has to go fast, but when the wind blows slow, Nora has great fun speeding up and slowing down with the wind.

programme.title: Dog Loves Robots
programme.desc: Dog and Pug meet an inventor in his space lab. The inventor shows them his robots.

programme.title: Rainy Day
programme.desc: Monty wonders whether there is a way to have fun outside, even when its raining.

programme.title: Its time for a race
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran have their own sports day with Jared and Cynthia, but when JoJo isnt fast enough to win the races, Gran Gran suggests JoJo try the egg and spoon race instead!

programme.title: Easter
programme.desc: Its the night before Easter and Bluey and Bingo are worried the Easter bunny is going to forget about them like last year.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriends baby...

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mos man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The 5 Billion Dollar Legacy
programme.desc: A crippled billionaire mails a letter to each of his long-lost daughters inviting them to go to Japan, in the hope that he will find a worthy heir to inherit his vast fortune. The sisters finally meet abroad the plane to Japan, and one of them is taken with a man who is going to investigate the death of his lawyer uncle in a mysterious hit-and-run.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: In this classic romantic melodrama, nightclub songstress Qing Qing falls for the handsome Peng Nan. However, the two go through an emotional roller coaster of misunderstandings, separations and mutual torment. When the two finally fall back into love, Qing Qing receives a shocking revelation that brings the story to its inevitable sad ending.

programme.title: Woman of the Night
programme.desc: The movie offers three stories of love and obsession. In the first tale, a young student with a voyeuristic habit spies on two of his female roommates. The second story follows an office manager who develops an infatuation for his secretary. The last story is a complex family drama about a debilitated father who forces his family to leave him.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this "young" auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his sons arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness and innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The Blue and the Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return...

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the "Full Moon Scimitar

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This intriguing wuxia saga is packed with conspiracies, power schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres around the struggle for underworld supremacy between two clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: When Jianying discovers the Zhao clans fortune will be left to his brother Yulong, he engineers his parents death and sends his own son out to kill Yulong.

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the "Tsai Li Fu" style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: Two Con Men
programme.desc: Two Con Men is a wonderfully twisted, pseudo-romantic comedy in the vein of "Robin Hood" meets "The Sting". Starring Liang Tien as Clever Chan and Chang Ying (whos done over 400 films) as Tricky Ching, its the age-old competition between a rookie con artist versus the ultimate, experienced flimflam man. Its a game Chen cannot afford to lose, because peoples lives - including his own, hang in the balance of good versus evil.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Focus Today
programme.desc: Focus Today traces current affairs from China and the world.

programme.title: Love and Let Love!
programme.desc: Cliff proposes to his girlfriend Terry but is killed in a car accident before she says "yes". Terry is devastated and inconsolable. When Cliffs ghost returns, they seem to go back to their good old days. However, Cliff is determined to help Terry get over his death and start anew.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husbands mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price...

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yips boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victims sister takes revenge by spiking the rapists drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: Feel 100% 2003
programme.desc: Based on the popular comic book of the same name, Jerry and Lok are two best buddies with a common goal of finding their perfect girlfriend. Neither of them has ever encountered anything close to their "100% girl

programme.title: God of Gamblers Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: This is the story about a career woman and her friend going through life with their resilience and perseverance during the highs and lows of the Hong Kong economy over a decade, from the Handover in 1997 through 2007.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Look Out, Officer!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is a delight in this supernatural action comedy, where a murdered police officer returns from beyond the grave to persuade a rookie cop into avenging his death.

programme.title: Sex Beyond The Grave
programme.desc: During World War II, a singer was raped and killed by Master Tao during her escape, with all her valuables stolen as well. Since then, the Taos house became haunted. Years later, Master Taos descendant sells the house to a young couple to pay off a massive gambling debt, but the couple soon discover that it is haunted by the vengeful spirit...

programme.title: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: An old lady died after mysteriously falling off a building and her ghost appears to haunt the place. This freaked out the security guards, who invite ghostbuster Leo and his female assistant to help. In the process, Leo finds out that the old lady was killed by her son and daughter in law. To rest her soul, Leo promises to bring the couple to justice.

programme.title: Man Wanted 3
programme.desc: Street kid Dong idolizes Mongkok triad leader Pu Jun and inadvertently joins his gang. When rival Xi Yang seizes control by illicit means, Pu Jun decides to take him down. At the same time, Pu Jun uncovers Dong as a police undercover and banishes him, but Dong sheds his undercover identity to join Pu Jun to seek revenge against Xi Yang.

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: The Exodus
programme.desc: A low-ranking cop discovers a group of women, including his superior, Madam Fang and his wife, plotting to eliminate the world of men.

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husbands death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfathers fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Crazy N The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nams dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris passion for work and life.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon II
programme.desc: This is a sequel to "Casino Tycoon". 20 years after Benny Ho established his casino empire in Macau, his former partner becomes envious and plots to bring him down. At the same time, a young man working for Benny is the son of his ex-lover, and is also out to take revenge on him. Ho however, is not about to take things lying down...

programme.title: One Nite in Mongkok
programme.desc: A mainland hitman Loy is hired to avenge the death of a gangsters son but the police are onto him from the start. While hiding in the dense streets of Mongkok, Loy saves a call girl Dan Dan from some gangsters. Loy and Dan Dan are hunted around Mongkok by police and gangsters. Who wiIl find them first, the lawful force or the lawless one?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: A heroic tale about Hong Kongs brave firefighters. These courageous men can march into disastrous firegrounds and risk their lives to save others. However, do they have the same courage to confront their personal issues?

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the schools stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Rileys mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: Painted Faces
programme.desc: This is based on the real-life story of Master Yu Jim Yuen who strives to run his academy in the 1960s, even as the opera culture is declining. Three young men, Sammo Hung, Jackie Chan and Yuen Biao, are determined to train under Master Yu and undergo extremely tough training before they become three of Hong Kongs biggest stars_x000D_

programme.title: I Love Lolanto
programme.desc: Lolanto, a playboy, is injured and meets the daughter of a tycoon, Man, in the hospital. Man is mentally retarded and makes friends easily with Lolanto hence Mans father hires him to take care of her. However, as Man goes through treatments and recovers, her feelings for Lolanto also changes...

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. Bs superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you whats moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and Chinas top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in Chinas domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, whats driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. programme.title: Mohini Aatam Arambam
programme.desc: In an attempt to gain eternal beauty, Nishanthi searches for 16 different ornaments to achieve her goal. However, to find these objects she must sacrifice the husband of every beautiful woman around.

programme.desc: Everyone discriminates against Surbhis sister, Soumya, for being intersex except their mother. Even Surabhi stands up for her sister when the times are tough.

programme.title: Hawaiian UFOs And More
programme.desc: Could religious occurrences around the world be proof of miracles? A man in Hawaii trespasses on government property and witnesses UFOs, plus more paranormal footage you have to see to believe.

programme.title: The Cigarette Break
programme.desc: A young man accused of killing a beloved 52-year-old woman changes his tune after a cigarette break and DNA technology helps detectives solve a decades-old murder mystery.

programme.title: Elizabeth Shoaf
programme.desc: In 2006, Elizabeth Shoaf was abducted near her rural South Carolina home. The teenager was missing for over a week when a text message came through that brought hope to the case.

programme.title: Lured
programme.desc: Several survivors detail the story of Jeffrey Epstein, the mysterious billionaire who lured them to his home through an elaborate series of female recruiters they thought they could trust.

programme.title: Cruel Intentions
programme.desc: A woman in a volatile relationship is found dead in her car. Detectives suspect her boyfriend, but, at trial, he takes the stand to brazenly claim she was actually the victim of a drug deal gone bad.

programme.title: After The 60 Days: Part One
programme.desc: After the remaining participant leaves the program, the sheriff and her staff process how to implement the feedback as the inmates continue serving their time.

programme.title: I Dont Know What To Do
programme.desc: A Florida woman hides in her bathroom when a strange man breaks into her home in the middle of the night. A man trapped in his overturned truck calls 911 in a panic as the vehicle fills with icy water.
A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: an armed robbery suspect escapes from the courthouse; a woman makes a virtual court appearance from her shower.
A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a mother asks the judge to sterilise her murderous daughter; a French tourist is in trouble for writing bad checks.

programme.title: Unfinished Business 2
programme.desc: A man is gunned down in broad daylight and detectives learn it could be connected to another homicide. A teenage girl is lured to her death by someone she considered a friend.

programme.title: Hawaiian UFOs And More
programme.desc: Could religious occurrences around the world be proof of miracles? A man in Hawaii trespasses on government property and witnesses UFOs, plus more paranormal footage you have to see to believe.

programme.title: Stone Cold Murder
programme.desc: A man is gunned down outside a local shop and authorities interrogate two of his acquaintances to find out which one of them pulled the trigger.

programme.title: A Watery Grave
programme.desc: Jeff and Jeannine Glanda have a picture-perfect family until selfishness and a shameless affair mark the beginning of the end. Money troubles and the threat of divorce breed paranoia and hate.
A typical Sunday morphs into a violent gunfight when two armed men invade a familys home; an unsuspecting impound lot worker checks out a disturbance and is nearly mowed down by an irate woman.

A woman attacks a bus driver in an out-of-control road rage incident; a man is beaten to within an inch of his life in a hate crime; a woman is brutally assaulted by her ex in a dollar store. And more.

programme.title: Ice Cold In Denver
programme.desc: On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalised. After 37 years, investigators tap into a public genealogy website that leads them to the killer theyve been hunting.

programme.title: Eyes Of A Killer
programme.desc: In February 2010, two gunmen shoot Michael Temple Jr, rendering him quadriplegic for the five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA from a knife is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Wade and Alexis
programme.desc: Wade is addicted to gaming. With no job and no income, he is on the verge of eviction. Alexis, 21, has been a cell phone junkie ever since she got her first phone at nine years old.

programme.title: Kerri and Devonte
programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devontes gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.title: Rogue Gun
programme.desc: When a devoted father is gunned down in Georgia, detectives uncover a string of shootings terrorising a community. Police and prosecutors must rely on circumstantial evidence to catch the shooter.

programme.title: Part 2 (B)
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

A woman attacks a bus driver in an out-of-control road rage incident; a man is beaten to within an inch of his life in a hate crime; a woman is brutally assaulted by her ex in a dollar store. And more.

programme.title: Wade and Alexis
programme.desc: Wade is addicted to gaming. With no job and no income, he is on the verge of eviction. Alexis, 21, has been a cell phone junkie ever since she got her first phone at nine years old.

programme.title: Kerri and Devonte
programme.desc: Kerri has an online gambling addiction that is tearing her family apart. Devontes gaming addiction makes Lisa question his ability to be a good father and husband.

programme.title: Rogue Gun
programme.desc: When a devoted father is gunned down in Georgia, detectives uncover a string of shootings terrorising a community. Police and prosecutors must rely on circumstantial evidence to catch the shooter.

programme.title: Ice Cold In Denver
programme.desc: On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalised. After 37 years, investigators tap into a public genealogy website that leads them to the killer theyve been hunting.

programme.title: Eyes Of A Killer
programme.desc: In February 2010, two gunmen shoot Michael Temple Jr, rendering him quadriplegic for the five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA from a knife is used to create a sketch of the killer.

programme.title: Part 2 (B)
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: Deadly Dad
programme.desc: After a 20-year-old man is crushed by a truck that fell off its jack, the victims father is brought in to face questions over whether it was really an accident or murder.
Joel Rifkin took the lives of 17 women in New York. Almost thirty years later, a TV producer leverages his relationship with New Yorks most prolific serial killer to get information police could use.

programme.title: Far From Home
programme.desc: In 2017, Chinese exchange student Yingying Zhang vanishes from the University of Illinois campus. Police and the FBI turn to surveillance footage to uncover the shocking and sinister truth.

programme.title: The Good Samaritan
programme.desc: Young professional Sasha Samsudean is brutally murdered in her apartment in Orlando. Detectives must turn to video surveillance footage to solve the mystery and bring a cold-blooded killer to justice.

programme.title: That Was Your Final Warning
programme.desc: A car chase transpires to rescue a hostage being held at gunpoint. After being shocked by 14,000 volts of electricity, a mans chance of survival is in the hands of his friend.

programme.title: Sally
programme.desc: A savvy poker player cleans up at the tables once at sea. But after she witnesses a man overboard, many begin to wonder if it was accidental or on purpose - and who is next?

programme.desc: Bad decisions cause people to get booked in, including a first-timer that resisted arrest for riding their bicycle on the wrong side of the road, a couple that had half a pound of meth.

programme.title: The Poison Ravine
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Imaginary Friends
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tinas imaginary friend, hes forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, hes forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Saving Shattermaster
programme.desc: When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: The Jungle Rooster
programme.desc: When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove theyre kind and helpful.

programme.title: The Yarn Fairy / Bake It ‘Til You Make It
programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think theyre a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves.

programme.title: Crabby / Spe-shell
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: That Stinking Feeling / Go for The Gold
programme.desc: When Donna is dog sitting but unable to sleep due to barking, TZG secretly stops a skunk from sneaking into her yard at night and riling the pooch. / When an inexperienced Rona takes over as chairman of the Founder’s Day Celebration, TZG secretly helps ensure the traditional festivities run smoothly.

programme.title: The Puppy Whisperer / Doggy Book of World Records
programme.desc: Tag becomes jealous when Yip prefers to spend time with puppy-sitter Beans instead of with her. Determined to win Yip back, Tag enlists the help of Cheddar Biscuit, Gilber, Spike and Frank to try and win him back. / Frank and Beans find out that Tag and Scooch are trying to get into the Doggy Book of World Records and sabotage every attempt. When Tag and Scooch find out what the sneaky duo are up to, they come up with a plan to outsmart them.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Daks lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leylas overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Things That Go Bump / Hide Like a Dew Drop
programme.desc: When "something" starts snatching things and causing havoc in Marcus house, Phoebe and the Dew Drops investigate only to find that its a stray kitten that they need to catch and find a home for before Marcus returns home. But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isnt very good at "Hide and Seek" so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! And now she’s going to be late to her own surprise tea party!

programme.title: Crabby / Spe-shell
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: New Tail
programme.desc: D-Structs loses his wrecking ball tail and wants to prove hes still dangerous, but when he gets stuck the crew must decide if they will save him.

programme.title: Ottos
programme.desc: When a meteor crashes into the Wrenchtools home, the Dinotrux take them to safe ground; little do they know D-Structs is planning a giant attack.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor whos huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive its an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Crabby / Spe-shell
programme.desc: When Pixie’s pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallop’s special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Lucky Penny / Hammy’s Day Out
programme.desc: Marcus has a piano recital and unknowingly forgets his lucky penny at home. Now it’s up to the Dew Drops to get the penny across town and back into Marcus’ pocket before showtime. / When Nicholas rolls the hamster ball (with Hammy inside) out into the streets, the Dew Drops must get Hammy back home safely.

programme.title: Tips Deep Dish / Garbage Day
programme.desc: When Tip loses her voice, Oh finds a way to use his own voice to talk to her crush Keanu; Oh invents a way to redo yesterday so Tip can redeem a rotten day.

programme.title: Very Foreign Exchange Student / Pigs Tail
programme.desc: Tips new friend, the Roidian, stays with the Tuccis in hopes of learning from humans; Tip accidentally swaps bodies with Pig.

programme.title: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought
programme.desc: When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Lucky and the Arabian Nightmares
programme.desc: When Al goes out of town, he puts the PALs in charge of the ramada, but they get more than they bargained for when three trouble-making horses escape

programme.title: Lucky and the Fearless Fillies
programme.desc: When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.title: Sitting Ducks
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tinas first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: The Big Dumpling
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corps super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: The Great Medieval London Fire 1135
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.desc: When Tip cant solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he cant "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

programme.desc: When Detective King Julien searches for a missing Butterfish he notices lemurs acting strange all around and realizes he has a serious mystery on his hands so he must get the Mystery Solving Team back together
