programme.title: Digglys Big Adventure
programme.desc: Diggly is bored of life on his compost heap and wants to see round the rest of the garden. Fifi offers to give him a guided tour. Diggly gets lost, how will he get home?

programme.title: The Case Of The Disappearing Rainbow
programme.desc: Its Fable Forest Rainbow Day when the big rainbow in Fable Forest sparkles and pops like a giant firework. Everyone is looking forward to it until the colours start fading from the rainbow! Noddy needs to investigate before the rainbow disappears for good! Revs converts into a helicopter so that Noddy and Bumpy can fly over the rainbow to find the pot of rainbow gold. They discover that Cloppycorn has been taking the gold from the pot to give his unicorn horn a special golden glow.

programme.title: The Case Of The Flying Toy
programme.desc: When Noddy sees Deltoid flying in the air he decides to investigate: how can they get Deltoid down? Realising that magic is involved, Noddy goes to see Queen Sparklewings to see if she can help but she tells him her wand has gone missing. Someone must be trying to do magic with her wand! Meanwhile more flying toys appear, first Fuse and then Smartysaurus.

programme.title: Why Ants Work Together
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Ants didnt work together. The Ants desperately wanted to build themselves a home, but all the animals kept sitting on them, or sneezing them far away or swooping them up into tall trees! On the point of giving up, one brave, young soldier ant rallies the troops… "Pamoja! Together! Together they can do anything!!!"… and he was right. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Flea Jumps
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Flea didnt jump. Flea didnt really move at all. She was very big and very round. All Flea wanted to do was to see the world. The Tinga Tinga animals try to help lift Flea high up, but she is too heavy. Then Tortoise comes up with an idea ‘Movement and activity! and after many attempts Flea discovers that she can jump. She can jump really high! Then Flea can jump everywhere and see everything.! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Mr Carburettors Birthday Suit
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor is off to try out his new wetsuit at the beach… it may come in useful when rain is forecast for the big race the next day!

programme.title: Big Bangs
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor is planning a big firework display up at the farm. Can Roary help Tin Top overcome his fear of bangs in time for the display?

programme.title: Boo to You
programme.desc: Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he cant get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: The Pawmazing Race
programme.desc: One of Tag’s biggest dreams is to be a contestant on her favorite TV game show: The Pawmazing Race, hosted by Kelly Korgi. Which is why she entered her entire family to compete in the family edition! And now that dream is finally coming true! / The Barker Family continue their quest to become the winners of The Pawmazing Race. But the challenges only get tougher from here on out. Tag learns that her family’s quirky traits can help them through any obstacle.

programme.title: Written By
programme.desc: When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada
programme.desc: Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Master Key
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Turf War
programme.desc: Its a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Babys tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Dire Straits
programme.desc: Viggo gets angry at the dragon riders continually interfering with his business and uses a deep sea dragon, the Submaripper, to control Berks trade.

programme.title: The Good Book
programme.desc: Julien hires Croc Ambassador, an etiquette expert, to teach the kingdom how to behave at a classy ball, but everyone is too uptight to party

programme.title: Where Theres Smoke
programme.desc: After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: Chore Score / Dew Drop Swap
programme.desc: On Harper’s first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harper’s Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they’ re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Spinny Water / Kelps Song
programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Welcome to Harmony Harbor
programme.desc: Ari moves in to Harmony Harbor, but notices something strange involving a group of kids, a Noodle Truck chef and her pet squirrel. / After Ari discovers the secret of Team Zenko Go, he asks to join the crew. But first he must learn the importance of teamwork.

programme.title: The Pawmazing Race
programme.desc: One of Tag’s biggest dreams is to be a contestant on her favorite TV game show: The Pawmazing Race, hosted by Kelly Korgi. programme.title: Heavy Metal
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Full House / Gift Express
programme.desc: Nicholas keeps stuffing oversized objects inside Eden’s fairy home. But it creates a BIG problem when Harper’s family wants to visit grandma and the car keys are nowhere to be found! / When Harper gets sick, Marcus builds a pulley between their apartments to send Harper treats. But when Qwak, the chipmunk, breaks the pulley, the Dews must step in to keep the treat train running.

programme.desc: The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: Rollodons
programme.desc: When tar fills the cracks of the crater, the Dinotrux must find a way to herd the free-roaming Rollodons to help smooth over the sticky situation.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Bizarre Blitzkrieg of the Bothersome Butt-erflies
programme.desc: As a prank, George and Harold use Melvins new animal hybrid invention to create a creature thats a cross between a butt and a fly. But some of the monster butt-erflies want to eat everything in sight- including the students hiding out in the school gym!

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals convention.Theres no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Yarn Fairy / Bake It ‘Til You Make It
programme.desc: When the trees start losing their leaves, Phoebe begins knitting the trees in the park sweaters, but when the neighborhood kids see the sweaters they think theyre a mysterious "Yarn Fairy," and they want to see her in action, making it much harder for the Dews to put more sweaters on the latest trees that have lost their leaves.

programme.title: Big Brain Boov / Pook Pooks
programme.desc: When Tip cant solve a homework problem, Oh takes them to the Big Brain Boov; Oh feels he cant "Pook Pook" in front of Tip, creating a gross mix-up.

programme.title: Waltor / Out Foxed
programme.desc: When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.desc: Lucky rushes to complete all of last year’s resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Year’s Eve

programme.title: Lucky and the Cousin Caper
programme.desc: Lucky and the PALs must rescue Julian after he gets in too deep while pledging a secret society at his school

programme.title: Lucky and the Wayward Wedding
programme.desc: Jim and Kate are getting married... or are they?

programme.title: Untitled Templeton Project
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town’s faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Biscuits Rising
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby who’s been hired to wreck Boss and Tina’s lives. Crispin puts the new company’s loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.desc: When the feared Scarlet Panther comes to town, Puss is forced to give up his boots and must wear laid-back slippers which change his personality

programme.desc: The twins are preparing for their birthday when they are visited by a notoriously mischievous relative administering the Thorston Rite of Passage challenges

programme.desc: When Tip is too busy to hang, Oh steals and befriends a squid from the city aquarium; The B. O. Boys attempt to tear Tip and Oh apart.

programme.desc: When King Juliens consultant tells him that his squad is losing their cool King Julien decides to get a whole new crew

programme.title: Lucky and the Thin Ice
programme.desc: The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: He Got Game Night/73
programme.desc: Turbo tries to juggle two dates at a party without being caught; White Shadow takes Skids advice on superstitions to keep his winning streak alive.

programme.title: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Keith is sent on a mission to destroy a weapon before Galra forces can find it

programme.title: Sherman From A To Zzzz/Akashi Shiganosuke
programme.desc: When Sherman hasnt slept in days because of a recurring nightmare, he causes mayhem on the set and Peabody must help Sherman confront his fears

programme.title: Pips Playground
programme.desc: Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Mud Sculptures
programme.desc: It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: The Case Of The Spooky Noise
programme.desc: The Naughticorns have borrowed Noddys music player to practise a special dance for Pat-Pats Pumpkin Party. But when Noddy arrives at the party, the other toys are all scared by a strange noise. Noddy decides to investigate: whats making the scary noise? Using his investigating skills and following all the clues, Noddy arrives at the Naughticorn Stables where he realises that the scary noise is actually a slowed down tune on the music player.

programme.title: The Case Of The Upset Animals
programme.desc: Something upsets all the animals at the farm at night and no one can get to sleep . Farmer Tom asks Noddy to investigate before night falls so that everyone can go to sleep properly. Using his wwwbook to gather clues and using all his investigation skills Noddy travels all over Toyland to find out what has been disturbing the animals. He works out that the new stickers that PatPat gave to the the animals are made out of glow in the dark paper.

programme.title: Why Hummingbird Hums
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Hummingbird didnt hum. She was called Songbird and Songbird thought she could sing like a Bird… but sadly that was not the case. All the animals tried to help Songbird improve her singing but nothing worked. What could they do?! Then Tortoise has an idea, maybe Songbird can sing without opening her beak!! Songbird agrees and hums the most beautiful hum Tinga Tinga has ever heard. From that day on Songbird was called Hummingbird. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Why Baboon Has A Bare Bottom
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Baboon didnt have a bare bottom and he was very naughty. Baboon loved to play tricks. He played tricks on Elephant. He played tricks on Ostrich. He even dared to play tricks on Lion, the King of Tinga Tinga! And then all the animals decided it was time for the tricks to stop and Baboon to get a dose of his own medicine. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Silver Hatch Pizza
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor has demanded pizza for lunch but the pizzeria is closed. How is Marsha going to ensure Mr Carburettor gets the lunch he asked for?

programme.title: Silver Hatch Stars
programme.desc: Roary is feeling put out as all the cars are paying Conrod too much attention. He is determined to show his worth when they race that afternoon. But tries too hard and ends up in danger. Who can save him?

programme.title: Message in a Bubble / Glitteretti
programme.desc: Kelp has a new trick with his bubbles: he can have his friends put voice messages inside that you hear when you pop them. But when Pixie decides she doesn’t want the others to hear what’s in her bubble, the chase is on to rescue it! / Juniper is devastated when the traditional ceremony to celebrate her next level of spark achievement can’t happen. Kelp helps introduce a new tradition.

programme.title: Tea Time’s Up / Barks, Baths, and Beyond
programme.desc: When Athena thinks Lola no longer wants to have their weekly tea party, a tradition they’ve had as long as Athena can remember, Athena tries everything she can to get Lola to have another one. / When Tracy and Harper accidentally leave Wilford at home, on their way to the Fairhaven Pet Get Together, it’s up to the Dew Drops to get him to the park on time. But because it just rained, getting Wilford there clean proves to be a challenge.

programme.title: Cats! The Planet / Selfie-Ish
programme.desc: When Pig is abducted by a cat-lady-alien, Tip and Oh must travel to a cat-planet to save him; After Tip becomes a social media star, Tip gets addicted to "the likes," risking Ohs life in the process

programme.title: Newbeings On The Block / Juicy Gossip
programme.desc: When an alien moves into the apartment above them, Oh thinks hes a threat to earth but nobody believes him; Oh befriends the Busy Bodies on Lucys behalf

programme.title: Close Encounters Of The Mort Kind
programme.desc: When Mort is abducted by "aliens

programme.title: The Butterfly War
programme.desc: King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdoms spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.

programme.title: The Business Boss: Back in Baby
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, hell need to win over Tims family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: The Stroll
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field teams focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra
programme.desc: In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! Its now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus
programme.desc: George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor whos huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: The Battle of Tianshang Part 1

The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.title: Moles
programme.desc: Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: Mermaid
programme.desc: To prove hes a ladies man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him … and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: Trolly Tales 2 / Rainbowmageddon
programme.desc: The Trolls try to entertain and win over Archer Pastry with a series of Troll stories/When a rainbow over Troll Village begins to experience a catastrophic breakdown, Cloud Guy arrives in the village to offer his assistance

programme.desc: When Cooper loses Guy Diamond in Troll Forest, Poppy and Branch accompany him as he retraces his steps /Poppy sets out to recreate the recipe of Branchs favorite dessert at any cost

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no ones having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer
programme.desc: In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

But in the end, Marcus decides to take the kitty in, as his own. / Lola isnt very good at "Hide and Seek" so the Dew Drops help her improve her game. But she becomes so good that no one can find her! programme.title: How to Start a Dragon Academy
programme.desc: Hiccup is given the responsibility to integrate dragons into the village of Berk and must contend with his rowdy friends, unruly dragons and an upset village elder.

programme.title: Viking For Hire
programme.desc: Now that dragon-killing is no longer necessary, Hiccup tries to find a new job for Gobber the Blacksmith, but the task proves harder than expected.

programme.title: Animal House
programme.desc: As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: Lucky and the Railroad Ransom
programme.desc: When Butch LePray hold Jim for ransom, Lucky and Spirit team up with the unlikeliest of allies to get her father back

programme.title: Lucky and the Flight of the Fancy
programme.desc: Lucky, Julian and Aunt Cora get swept away in Julian’s new hot air balloon and must fend for themselves in the wilderness

programme.title: Indonesia - Sinking into Disaster
programme.desc: Indonesia is grappling with grave ecological problems. While pollution caused by plastic waste threatens ecosystems, Jakarta is sinking into the sea. The city is quite literally going under. Climate activists and authorities are doing what they can to halt the process.

programme.title: How to Tell A Secret - Raising Awareness of HIV in Ireland -Part 2
programme.desc: An HIV-positive diagnosis is something people still hide, today. In this film, people in Ireland living with HIV share their experiences - some for the first time on camera - with emotional candor, using a variety of means.

programme.title: WCCB Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
programme.desc: Five time World Champion and boxing superstar Gervonta Tank Davis and undefeated World Champion Hector Luis Garcia kick off the year by headlining a stacked card from the Capital One Arena in Washington DC. Davis has established himself as one boxings must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: Budpaest 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Dont miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC light middleweight title bout when Shane Mosley battles Saul (Canelo) Alvarez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: Tokyo, Japan: Show 4
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxings most colorful champions. Hector Camachos dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector Macho Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Bruno Capdeville vs. Ryan Brigham
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Bruno Capdeville and Ryan Brigham put on a show in Evansville, IN, USA.

programme.title: Las Vegas Finale: Part 2
programme.desc: In the season finale of American Ninja Warrior, the top contestants from across the nation compete in the ultimate athletic challenge. With the bright lights of Las Vegas shining on the finalists and the crowd cheering on the competition, the ANW finale celebrates the passion of all the aspiring Ninja Warriors that pursued the privilege to grapple with the famously intimidating Mount Midoriyama.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges scorecards.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Adrien Broner taking on Martin Rodriguez to determine the new WBO super featherweight world champion. With both fighters looking for their first major world championship, one left hook will bring about a new champion. Also on the card, action from multi-weight champion Paul Williams and Verno Phillips.

programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Endo, Abi, Meisei and Chiyonokuni from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxings most colorful champions. Hector Camachos dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camachos best fights from the legendary USAs Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Mariusz Pudzianowski vs. Pawel Mikolajuw
programme.desc: This episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA showcases action from KSW 37 in Krakow Poland, highlighted by a Heavyweight showdown between hard-punching Mariusz Puszianowski taking on the Popek Monster Pawel Mikolajuw. Both fighters weigh in at over 250 lbs. and can end the fight at any moment. Its Pudzianowski vs. Mikolajuw, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Pet Shop
programme.desc: The three Baby Bears try to get adopted at a pet shop and find a new home.

programme.title: Villain Time
programme.desc: Ben must turn alien to save the Hoover Dam from disaster, but when tough guy hero Tim Buktu swoops in to help, Ben must figure out if Tim is friend or foe.

programme.title: Something I Ate
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max go on a tour of the impervious Fort Knox, but when Dr. Animo incites a hungry ani-mutate to attack the Fort, Ben must stop it before it gobbles up the nations monetary standard!

programme.title: Dont Let The Bass Drop
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen are excited to attend an Earth Day EDM concert in Portland until the show is hijacked by the sound-manipulating baddy, Lord Decibel, who uses sound as a weapon to trash the planet.

programme.title: Cutting Corners
programme.desc: Ben approaches Geezer Bob about doing a little yard work to earn spending money and accidentally draws the ire of Bobs gnome-neighbours: the tiny, terrifyingly tenacious Billy-Bob Goblins.

programme.title: Animo Farm
programme.desc: Ben stumbles into Dr. Animos secret lab - now ruled by his superior mutants, the Alphas - and must help the lesser animals escape while stuck as Stinkfly.

programme.title: The Prince And The Blobby Princess
programme.desc: Princess Syllabob, the blobby daughter of Axalotly, King of the Deep, has been carried off by a gang of gulls and discarded on the forest floor.

programme.title: The Prince And The Wise Wizard Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Struck down by a poisonous turnip, Prince Ivandoe and Bert must seek a cure from the Wise Wizard of Wisdom.

programme.title: The Prince And The Squeak Of Obedience
programme.desc: Feral and her gang of cat-thieves have stolen Prince Ivandoes map to Eagle Mountain. Cupcake, the pink-poodle survivalist offers to train Prince Ivandoe to become a Jungle Warrior

programme.title: The Prince And The Princenappers
programme.desc: Whilst travelling through the notoriously dangerous Forest of Outlaws, Prince Ivandoe is repeatedly Princenapped!

programme.title: The Prince And The Playdate Part 1
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe is a prisoner in the castle dungeon of Jezabels mother, Grizabella - the unpredictable and slightly terrifying Queen of Thieves.

programme.title: Elmo Helps The Amazing Zero!
programme.desc: The Amazing Zero and Elmo are on Sesame Street to help people by taking everything away when they need it to get to zero.

programme.title: The Grover Game
programme.desc: Welcome to Street Carnival Day! Cookie Monster is playing the Grover Game and needs to move ping pong balls off a plate without touching them. What if he blows through a tube to move the balls? Lets try!

programme.title: 10,000 BC
programme.desc: A young mammoth hunter leads a band of hunters to rescue his love in this prehistoric epic.

programme.title: Rumpelstiltskin
programme.desc: Robert Townsend and Denzel Washington lend their voices to this Caribbean-style version of the tale about a strange little man who can spin straw into gold.

programme.title: Over The Hedge
programme.desc: When a newly developed suburb threatens the livelihood of a group of local animals, a savvy raccoon named RJ comes to the rescue.

programme.title: My Clique
programme.desc: Chloe, a child prodigy, finds it difficult to connect with her much older classmates. The Bears take her under their wing, showing her how to make great college friends.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: Grizz comes home with a live crab and thinks it can become a pet for the brothers to share. However, after the crab pinches Ice Bears ear, Panda and Grizz have to get their brother to the hospital.

programme.title: Cupcake Job
programme.desc: When the Bears beloved laptop breaks, they have to get jobs for the first time ever. Working at a trendy cupcake shop, the Bears find that the working world is much tougher than they realised.

programme.title: Pandas Sneeze
programme.desc: When a Vine video of his very lovable sneeze goes viral, Panda becomes a cute sensation, which causes Nom Nom to try to fend off of this new challenger to his throne.

programme.title: Brother Up
programme.desc: After Panda stumbles and accidentally scares a pack of wolves away in the process, the hierarchy of the Bears is disrupted and suddenly, Panda has become the alpha bear.

programme.title: Riding The Storm Out
programme.desc: Ben and Gwens camping trip is interrupted by the emotionless Weatherheads. But a malfunctioning Omnitrix, firing out a mishmash of aliens, may not be the forecast for success.

programme.title: Need For Speed
programme.desc: Touring Yellowstone, Ben uncovers a plot by the fast and furious LaGrange to find treasure buried below the national park. But with Old Faithfuls help, Overflow is able to douse LaGranges dreams.

programme.title: Brief Career Of Lucky Girl
programme.desc: When a wizard cosplayer gets his hands on a real, magical wand at Comic Con, Ben enlists Gwen to help stop Hex from retrieving it.

programme.title: Waterfilter
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Maxs trip to Niagara Falls is cut short by the horrid Hydromanders - creatures menacing them and their fellow tourists.

programme.title: Shhh!
programme.desc: While relaxing at a monastery with a no-noise policy, Ben cant keep quiet and accidentally awakens a dangerous dragon hidden in a secret chamber below the hallowed halls.

programme.title: The Prince And The Playdate Part 2
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe is a prisoner in the castle dungeon of Jezabels mother, Grizabella - the unpredictable and slightly terrifying Queen of Thieves.

programme.title: The Prince And The Legendary Rabbit Hood
programme.desc: Mistaking Prince Ivandoe for a lowly peasant, Rabbit Hood bestows upon him precious jewellery - that she has stolen from a Prince.

programme.title: The Prince And The Yucky Duckling
programme.desc: A Hooded Stranger from Prince Ivandoes past seeks revenge, by attempting to ruin Ivandoes perfect princely appearance.

programme.title: The Prince And The Unruly Royal
programme.desc: Prince Ivandoe receives instructions from his father, The Mighty Stag. He is to escort his spoilt cousin Dudley to a correctional school.

programme.title: The Prince And The Show-Off Stallion
programme.desc: When the legendary Mighty Stallion "out-heros" Prince Ivandoe, by saving the Bunny Village from a terrifying beastie, Ivandoe loses his confidence.

programme.title: The Kitty Sitters
programme.desc: Theres a lost kitten on Sesame Street. While Chris and Elmo put up signs to try to find the kittens owner, Grover and Cookie Monster help look after it and learn all about how to take care of a kitten.

programme.title: Irrigation Irritation
programme.desc: Tamir is leaving for robotics camp and needs to figure out how to keep the garden watered while hes away. With help from his friends, Tamir makes a drip irrigation system so the community garden can get plenty of water.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Meryl Streep stars in this well-loved musical which follows a girl as she invites three men to her wedding, one of whom she suspects to be her father.

programme.title: An American Girl: Chrissa Stands Strong
programme.desc: When Chrissa moves to a new school in the middle of the year, she is greeted by the girls in her fourth-grade class with teasing and tricks.

programme.title: A Waltons Thanksgiving
programme.desc: The Walton family prepares for the Harvest Festival Fair in town. But this year, a young boy arrives that will dramatically change the Waltons lives.

programme.title: The Kitty Sitters
programme.desc: Theres a lost kitten on Sesame Street. While Chris and Elmo put up signs to try to find the kittens owner, Grover and Cookie Monster help look after it and learn all about how to take care of a kitten.

programme.title: Irrigation Irritation
programme.desc: Tamir is leaving for robotics camp and needs to figure out how to keep the garden watered while hes away. With help from his friends, Tamir makes a drip irrigation system so the community garden can get plenty of water.

programme.title: My Clique
programme.desc: Chloe, a child prodigy, finds it difficult to connect with her much older classmates. The Bears take her under their wing, showing her how to make great college friends.

programme.title: Declaration Of Indepawndence
programme.desc: Rick heads to New York City to check out an original broadside of the Declaration of Independence. Will he put his John Hancock on the line for this multi-million-dollar piece of history?

programme.desc: Tim Allen, Richard Karn and April Wilkerson set their sights on lights and lasers. In Tims workshop, the team attempt to foil a Mission: Impossible-style security grid created by a pair of laser experts.

programme.title: Magnets
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Richard Karn and April Wilkerson feel the attraction of magnets. In Tims workshop, they use magnets for several helpful hacks and Tim tangles with ultra-powerful rare earth magnets.

programme.desc: Four smiths get cooking when they are tasked with forging a chefs knife. After a round of testing performed by a professional chef, only two head back to their home forge to build a brutal hog splitter.

programme.desc: A former Russian spy selling international intelligence on the black market...a list of the top undercover agents in the world...a corrupt agent doubling for an unknown organization...a mysterious arms dealer...a spy agency ready to disavow the actions or existence of any of its members captured or killed...and one man, whose mission seems impossible.

programme.desc: Newcastle have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool, and are winless in 15 against the Reds since a 2-0 win in December 2015 (D4 L11).

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Wolves have won five of their last six league games against Everton (D1), more victories than they’d managed in their previous 21 against them (W4 D8 L9).

programme.desc: Brentford have never won an away league game against Aston Villa (D6 L3), with the Bees only facing Stoke (14) and Halifax Town (11) more often on the road without ever winning in their league history.

programme.title: Premier League 2024/25
programme.desc: Southampton have won their last two Premier League games against Chelsea, as many as in their previous 18 (D5 L11). They last won three consecutive league games against the Blues between 1979 and 1985.

programme.title: Vendée Globe Les Sables dOlonne 2024/25 Weekly Highlights Episode 3
programme.desc: The Vendée Globe is a single-handed, non-stop, non-assisted round-the-world sailing race that takes place every 4 years. The skippers set off from Les Sables-dOlonne in Vendée and sail around 45,000 kilometres around the globe, rounding the three legendary capes (Good Hope, Leeuwin and finally Cape Horn) before returning to Les Sables dOlonne. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: Mountain Bike - Roc dAzur
programme.desc: Roc d’Azur is an annual mountain biking event held in Fréjus and Roquebrune-sur-Argens since 1997. It has become the number one mountain bike event in the world and celebrates with the ensemble of cycling and mountain bike universe, starting with thousands of amateur cyclists coming all over France and 50 different countries.

programme.title: Mubadala Citi DC Open (500) Finals
programme.desc: The Washington or DC Open (branded as the Mubadala Citi DC Open for sponsorship reasons), is a WTA 500 event played on outdoor hardcourt at the William H.G. FitzGerald Tennis Center in Rock Creek Park in Washington, D.C.

programme.title: Toray Pan Pacific Open Tennis (500) Finals
programme.desc: The Pan Pacific Open is a womens outdoor hardcourt tennis tournament held annually in Tokyo, Japan. It is being held at the Ariake Coliseum and Ariake Tennis Forest Park.

programme.desc: Relive all the best moments from the most significant tennis event in the womens annual calendar at the King Saud University Indoor Arena.

programme.title: Qatar TotalEnergies Open 2024 (1000) SF 1

programme.desc: The WTA Finals will be contested by the top 8 singles players and doubles teams competing in a round-robin format with the singles champion lifting the WTA Finals Billie Jean King Trophy and the doubles champions earning the WTA Finals Martina Navratilova Trophy.

programme.title: Nedbank Golf Challenge Day 3

programme.title: Homemade Love Story
programme.desc: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

programme.title: Hilarious Family
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Strange Tales of Tang Dynasty II - To The West
programme.desc: Set during Tang Dynastys peak, the sequel follows Lu Lingfeng (Yang Xuwen), head of the Dali Temple, and Su Wuming (Yang Zhigang), a Qianling official as they leave Changan for the west on a fearless journey to unravel mysterious cases amid lurking dangers.

programme.desc: Sound the fire alarm! These chefs have a penchant for peppers so theyre twisting classic foods and cranking the heat up. Grab a glass of milk because these twisted dishes will set your taste buds on fire.

programme.title: MasterChef USA (S13)
programme.desc: The remaining home chefs must tackle a classic test: the tag team challenge. Contestants must take turns preparing a delicious three-course meal, working together to ensure they are on the same page.

programme.title: My Sisters Serial Killer Boyfriend

programme.title: Drama Serial "Come Come Everybody" Encore Eps. 14
programme.desc: In 1925, radio broadcasting was initiated in Japan and soon after, a program for English language learners began. This is a family drama depicting 100 years of three generations who lived with this English radio program; Yasuko who was born on the same day as the radio broadcasting started, her child Rui, and grandchild Hinata. Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Omusubi" Eps. 49 (R)
programme.desc: A Heisei youth graffiti drama, in which the heroine Yoneda Yui (Hashimoto Kanna), born in the first year of the Heisei era, connects peoples hearts to the future as a nutritionist. Always cherishing her individuality, she sometimes struggles, but powerfully and joyfully pushes through the turbulent Heisei and Reiwa eras.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow: A Year in the Life of the 6-Chome Higashi-Kojiya Metropolitan
programme.desc: The Higashi-Kojiya 6-chome metropolitan housing complex near Haneda airport is over 50 years old, and the majority of its residents are elderly. The area surrounding the complex is a marginalized community in Tokyo, where 64 % of the residents are over 65 years old. This human document focuses on the lives and aging of the people who have worked hard and made the housing complex their new home during the period of high economic growth.

programme.title: Pest Friends Forever
programme.desc: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he cant sit still!

programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Georges New Dinosaur
programme.desc: When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Foxs Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Grandpa Pigs Train to the Rescue
programme.desc: Miss Rabbits train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.desc: Barbabeau cant paint. He has a hiccup he cant get rid of. Just when hes about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.desc: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapas cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.desc: All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now its up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: Blazing Amazing Stories
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are babysitting for Baby Gherkin! When its time for her nap, they tell her three epic bedtime stories about police, cowboys, and superheroes - all starring Blaze and his friends!

programme.desc: Ryder and the PAW Patrol have to rescue Alex when he takes off on his new "super trike". // Marshall proves he is a true hero when he stops to put out a real fire on the beach during a race against the clock for a trophy.

programme.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? // Its Burns Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis, but will it visit them?

programme.desc: Rubble and Crews favorite book series has new additions! But when theres no room for them in the library, the pups have to get creative.// The pups have a surprise just for Rubble... a snack dispenser! But will they finish it before Rubble finds out?

programme.title: The Rainforest Ritmo / The Magic Nut
programme.desc: Isas throwing a party where everyone will be dancing the Rainforest Ritmo. Boots has to learn the dance before they get there! // Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Ticos magic nut that can turn into your favorite food.

programme.desc: When a group of bunny slugs wander off, Vola sets out to round them up all by herself. // When William adopts a sea pig named Chumby, the little squirt is more trouble than William bargained for.

programme.title: Sharkdogs Got Talent

programme.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a bedtime story. Later George wakes up again, so Peppa has to make up another story.

programme.title: Lost Keys
programme.desc: After a family trip to a mountain beauty spot, Daddy Pig loses the car keys down a very deep drain.

programme.title: Georges New Dinosaur
programme.desc: When his favorite toy dinosaur loses its tail, George visits Mr Foxs Shop to find a new one.

programme.title: Grandpa Pigs Train to the Rescue
programme.desc: Miss Rabbits train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Pizza / Bread
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: Hiccupism / Silence please
programme.desc: Barbabeau cant paint. He has a hiccup he cant get rid of. Just when hes about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.desc: All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now its up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.desc: Miss Lucas is intent on proving to Jennie and Anika that nothing suspicious is happening at the Academy. Meanwhile, Jasmyn calls Oliver for help, and the Florian situation begins to escalate beyond the Hunters control, reaching a chilling climax.

programme.title: Seashell
programme.desc: On a volcanic island that has recently opened to the public, the gang finds a talking shell that encourages them to indulge in their fantasies. Then, when the volcano starts to erupt, they must escape not only the island but the power of the shell.

programme.title: Time to Eat / Cleanin House
programme.desc: Patrick hosts a time-travelling food show. // While Bunnys in Klopnod, the Star home becomes a mess.

programme.title: The Flower Plot / SpongeBob on Parade
programme.desc: The Chum Bucket is replaced by a flower shop with a charming new owner. // The Krusty Krab enters a float in the annual Bikini Bottom Parade.

programme.title: Delivery to Monster Island / Ride Patrick Ride
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Plankton must work together to survive an island of deadly monsters. // SpongeBob teaches Patrick how to ride a bike.

programme.title: Hill Fu / Suns Out, Funs Out
programme.desc: Its the annual foam-fisted all-camp karate battle, and SpongeBob trains to beat the butt-kicking Sandy. // Its the hottest day of summer, but theres only one AC in the whole camp.

programme.title: Relaxosmurf / The Cuddly Toy
programme.desc: When Timid is too shy to approach Blossom, Papa Smurf gives him a potion to boost his confidence. // When Lazy loses his pillow, only Babys cuddly toy will let him get back to sleep.

programme.title: Wild Gets Tamed / The Yummyus Pie
programme.desc: Begonia, Lily, and Blossom teach Wild a lesson after her steals their cupcakes. // Chef is worried when the main ingredient for his famous Equinox pie, the Yummyus, is late blooming.

programme.title: Grandparent Trap / Miss Step
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne thinks her grandparents marriage is in trouble after watching a relationship talk show. // Ronnie Anne learns the art of baile folklorico - and that her Tia Frida is one intense instructor!

programme.title: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill
programme.desc: When Bobby finds out Carl cant swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: Karma Chameleon / Team Effort
programme.desc: The Changs go on vacation, leaving Ronnie Anne and her cousins to look after Cam, the chameleon snake. // Ronnie Anne and her skate buddies work together to show their coach they can make a good team.

programme.title: Cuddle E. Hugs / Pat the Horse
programme.desc: SpongeBobs new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. Theres one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!

programme.title: Drive Happy / Old Man Patrick
programme.desc: SpongeBob cant drive, but you dont need a license to operate a self-driving car! // Patrick thinks hes an old man, so its up to SpongeBob to remind him how much fun being a kid can be!

programme.title: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmums the Word
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. Its a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: Doodle Dimension / Moving Bubble Bass
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick become trapped in an alternate dimension where anything they draw comes to life. // SpongeBob and Patrick help Bubble Bass move out of his mothers basement.

programme.title: Stress Test / How to Train Your Carl
programme.desc: The family tries to help Bobby get over his test taking anxieties. // Carl gets lost in the city zoo after sneaking away from his family, in search of Keyon, the Komodo dragon.

programme.title: Strife Coach
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her friends help get Mrs. Kernicky hired as the new PE coach, but her classes are no joke!

programme.title: Linc or Swim / Changing the Baby
programme.desc: Lincoln purchases a kiddie pool, and things get out of hand when all 10 of his sisters want to use it. // After noticing that none of his sisters share his interests, Lincoln attempts to mold Lily into his mini-me.

programme.title: Hand-Me-Downer / Sleuth or Consequences
programme.desc: After Lincoln gets a pink hand-me-down bike from Lori, he borrows Lynns cool BMX bike without telling her. // Someone clogged the Loud House toilet and Lincoln sets out to find out whodunit.

programme.title: Leonardo Saddles Up
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isnt all its cracked up to be.

programme.title: Tango Tangle / Necro-Nom-Nom-Nom-I-Con
programme.desc: Plankton and Karen take dance lessons and quickly become the top of the class. // Equipped with a magical spell book, SpongeBob cooks up chaos in the Krusty Krab kitchen.

programme.title: PL-1413 / In the Mood to Feud
programme.desc: Plankton travels two thousand years into the future and finds a few unfamiliar faces. // SpongeBob, Patrick, and Sandy find themselves in the middle of a long-standing feud between the Narwhals and the Planktons.

programme.title: The Road Not Taken
programme.desc: After their near-disastrous run-in with the trolls, Max decides to play it safe and lead the Midknights down a seemingly serene garden trail. Unfortunately, Maxs choice causes the quest to take a turn when the gang encounters an unexpected obstacle.

programme.title: Scales of Justice / Crimes of Fashion
programme.desc: When Lana learns her favorite fish are in jeopardy of losing their home to construction she springs into action. // When Leni gets fired from her job due to missing scarves, Lincoln and Clyde (as Ace and Jack) take on the case.

programme.title: Absent Minded / Be Stella My Heart
programme.desc: Clyde discovers he didnt earn junior administrator job. But can he give up the perks that come along with it? // When the new girl starts hanging around Lincoln and his friends, they begin to suspect she likes one of them.

programme.title: Sitting Bull / The Spies Who Love Me
programme.desc: The older sisters reluctantly let Lynn into their babysitting club but she quickly proves to be too aggressive. // Ronnie Anne wants to go downtown. But her grandparents think its too dangerous, so they decide to spy on her.

programme.title: Friend or Faux
programme.desc: Lisa gets her kindergarten report card back to discover shes gotten an F - in social skills. To bring up her grade, she must make a friend.

programme.title: Leonardo Saddles Up
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isnt all its cracked up to be.

programme.title: Spatula of the Heavens / Garys Playhouse
programme.desc: SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his beloved spatula reforged by the legendary Guru Greasetrap. // SpongeBob builds a snail-house outside for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: Swimming Fools / The Goobfather
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds "Patty Whips" to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Away Game / Monster Cash
programme.desc: Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dads new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuelas tale of El Cucuy, and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown
programme.desc: When Ronnie Anne realizes that shes not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: Radioactive Cat
programme.desc: Boses Mom, Celia, picks up Schwozs lost radioactive cat from outside SW.A.G. and takes it home, so Danger Force and Captain Man have to try and get it back before she goes nuclear.

programme.title: The Great Cactus Con
programme.desc: Jasper gets the chance to take his crush to Cactus Con. When a mysterious villain gets involved the entire gang is forced into action!

programme.title: A Really Loud Thanksgiving: The Gobble Squabble Debacle
programme.desc: Its Thanksgiving Day and Lola has been crowned "Little Miss Giblets" by The National Giblet Distribution Company. When she discovers the ceremony is a sham, she and the Louds steal the turkey to set it free.

programme.title: The Blemish Dilemish
programme.desc: We meet the Action News Team as Lincoln finds himself taken aback by a new crush. Mom and Dad attempt to befriend a doctor to avoid the astronomical medical expenses that come with having 11 children.

programme.title: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager
programme.desc: When Man Ray rents Squidwards house for the weekend, its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Bubble Bass Reviews / Patricks Prison Pals
programme.desc: Bubble Bass reviews The Patrick Show. // Bunny brings Patrick to prison for "Bring Your Kid To Work Day".

programme.title: High Sea Diving / Bottle Burglars
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to be the first sponge to dive all the way up to the surface of the ocean! // When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, its up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: A Knight to Remember
programme.desc: The Louds travel to London when Luna receives an invitation to Mick Swaggers knighting ceremony but get caught up in a special mission when Lincoln runs into a familiar face.

programme.title: Europe Road Trip: Nonna Your Business / Europe Road Trip: Alpining Away
programme.desc: The Louds journey to Naples Italy to taste the worlds best pizza, made by a secretive and legendary chef. // When Lynn crushes on a boy in the Swiss Alps, Lori and Leni become her crush coaches to help her talk to him.

programme.title: Nightmare Nightmore
programme.desc: Draculaura is set on hosting the perfect holiday party. But when things dont go as planned, she struggles to cope with unmet expectations and sharing the spotlight with someone new.

programme.title: Some Buddy to Love
programme.desc: Mom and Dad attempt to enjoy a day to themselves by pairing up all of the Loud siblings with each other for the day.

programme.title: Miles Has Visions
programme.desc: When AWOL starts seeing visions of the future right before they happen, Captain Man believes it must be the work of Swellviews leading time-crime villain, The Time Jerker.

programme.title: Captain Man Strikes Out
programme.desc: When Captain Man goes on strike because he refuses to pay for art that he destroyed on a mission, the Vice-Mayor hires a new hero to defend Swellview - Monsieur Man.

programme.title: Im Gonna Forget You, Sucka
programme.desc: After Cherry accidently posts a photo revealing the Thundermans secret, the Hero League forces Phoebe to do the unthinkable and end the relationship with her best friend.

programme.title: Dont Lose Your Head
programme.desc: Chaos ensues as Max and the Midknights try to break Uncle Budrick out of the castle before he is beheaded. With Mumblins help, they narrowly escape King Gastleys clutches and later learn from Kevyn that King Conrad is alive!

programme.title: Bye Tanya / What Lies Beneath
programme.desc: Leni must protect her mannequin friend Tanya when her boss, Ms. Carmichael, decides to update Reiningers. // When Dante buries a secret in The Royal Woods Cemetery, he must stop the Morticians Club from discovering what it is.

programme.title: The Loudest Mission: Relative Chaos
programme.desc: Bobby fits in great but Ronnie Anne struggles with the smothering nature of their relatives. Little do they know, their mother has a secret motive.

programme.title: Leonardo Saddles Up
programme.desc: The mutant seahorse called MUSTANG SALLY is going to flood the city... and the only thing standing in his way are LEO and Pigeon Pete. Being the leader isnt all its cracked up to be.

programme.title: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: SpongeBob befriends a small storm cloud, but has to protect it from a crazed weather man.

programme.title: Garys Got Legs / King Plankton
programme.desc: Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBobs aquarium.

programme.title: Swamp Mates / One Trick Sponge
programme.desc: Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure. // SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he cant find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: Three Bridges
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins try to help Zhao, a close friend of Kumu, recover her life savings that was all lost to a scammer. TC becomes increasingly frustrated at the lack of progress in his recovery and pushes everyone away.

programme.title: Appetite For Danger
programme.desc: Magnum and Higgins enlist Katsumoto to go undercover when a chef at a high-end restaurant goes missing. Kumu works with Cade at the Cultural Center, confronting one of America’s darker chapters - the internment of Japanese Americans in the wake of Pearl Harbor.

programme.title: Night Has A Thousand Eyes
programme.desc: Magnum and Rick race to find a missing witness who can exonerate an innocent man accused of murder. TC tries to repair his relationship with Mahina after being released from the VA.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the ensuing riots.

programme.title: The Draft, Smash Bash
programme.desc: The top 15 chefs are drafted into their three teams; the contestants must prepare an all-American smash burger that proves their cooking abilities.

programme.title: Curry In A Hurry
programme.desc: The 14 remaining chefs are tasked with preparing a curry dish that promises to pack a punch with only 30 minutes on the clock; the winning dish gives the entire team immunity and claims the top-level kitchen for the next challenge.

programme.desc: A troubled video game designer and her team find themselves in bizarre circumstances which mirror the videogame they have created. Trapped in a toxic building, she must help her colleagues escape. It’s no longer a game.

programme.desc: Jaz, Errol, Dom and Caspar begin to test the shifting boundaries of their own and others psychosis. Aroundthem, the building assumes a malevolent life of its own.

programme.title: Wonderland

programme.title: Constricted
programme.desc: A romantic date ends with a teenager fighting for her life in the hospital; Carisi cant help bringing the case home with him as he envisions the dangers ahead for his growing daughters.

programme.title: Economics Of Shame
programme.desc: When a TV reporter becomes the victim of sextortion that could ruin her career, Benson helps her take back control while Velasco goes undercover as a potential rich target.

programme.title: Roschach
programme.desc: Agent Clay consults with Benson when a woman is found gravely injured at a remote campground and the suspect could be anywhere along the Eastern Seaboard; Bruno and Silva take a chance on an odd hunch to see if it becomes a lead.

programme.title: Tenfold
programme.desc: Bruno must get to the center of a victim’s incomplete story to track down a serial rapist. Carisi is helpless to stop a crime he suspects is about to be committed.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: The life story of heavyweight boxing champion Muhammad Ali, following the champs early days as Cassius Clay and his rise in sports and politics, including his controversial refusal to fight in the Vietnam War and his infamous comeback battles.

programme.title: Warrior
programme.desc: A former marine and his cash-strapped brother prepare to go head to head in a mixed martial arts battle in order to win the biggest prize ever handed out in the sport. Will the fight force them to finally confront their past, or push them further apart?

programme.title: Shanghai
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as an American intelligence official who returns to Shanghai in late 1941 to investigate the death of a friend, which leads him to both love and a much larger conspiracy.

programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisas mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like youve never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asias most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the worlds most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. Its the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.
