programme.title: Satisfactory
programme.desc: Satisfactory means fulfilling expectations or needs; acceptable, though not outstanding or perfect. Is a cooking program that will present a healthy, special, and filling menu suitable for breaking the fast. Guided by an interactive and excellent host in preparing home-cooked meals, so that the audience can easily do it at home.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The shows mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. The program will inspire women associated with their passion for hobbies, fashion, makeup, beauty and health, astrology, and events. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesnt have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owners personality. This program will provide inspiration from peoples stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: The $100 Nomad
programme.desc: Got a weekend, an adventurous spirit and a hundred dollars? We fly Xenia, Fauzi and Zhin to 10 unexplored destinations with only $100 for food, activities and lodging. By chasing unreal landscapes and spending nights at unlikely abodes where no tourists go, the $100 nomads prove that budget stands in no way of a grand adventure.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesias wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesias wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canadas finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMPs Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdoms Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UKs most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Fanatic
programme.desc: Great love and admiration for something can be an interesting story to talk about.

programme.title: Asian Art Stories
programme.desc: Asian Art Stories profiles 18 diverse Asian-origin artists across Fine Arts, Music, Dance, Theatre, Multimedia and Design. Weaving together personal stories and artistic practices through different perspectives, this series explores how life in Aotearoa New Zealand informs their work and sense of cultural identity.

programme.title: Searchinc
programme.desc: Facts behind Indonesias local wisdom (could be developed to Southeast Asian countries), A Seeking information process that will be validate from credible expert or professional and Proving some topic / statement, whether is a fact or a myth, or any daily life question.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Sportlite
programme.desc: Find the history and unique story in every sport branches with Sportlite.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: This news programme chronicles the latest events, developments, inventions, discoveries and happenings around the world.

programme.title: Anamika - Thriller Serial
programme.desc: Bound for over 200 years, and in a quest for indomitable power, an evil entity that Anamika releases by ill fate threatens her lover Nandas life and her boss Rishis unrequited love for her. Setting off an age-old battle between good and evil.

programme.title: MALAR
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malars ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner and a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destinys plan for them?

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthis naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted and burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmadas mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father and his estranged family entwines with Kathirs task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Punnagai Poove
programme.desc: Ever since destiny united Kalaivani with Chezhiyan during childhood, she has been thinking of him as her prince charming. Will her hopes of a fairy tale life prevail against the odds and hurdles she is about to encounter?

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace and heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds and win over her husbands large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gauthams controlling aunt Bairavi and her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst lifes many hardships?

programme.desc: What is the possible signs of knee osteoarthritis? What are the types of osteoarthritis and what treatments available?

programme.title: (PG)Episode 2(English Subtitles)

programme.title: (PG)Episode 9(English/Malay Subtitles)
programme.desc: Love supposed to be easy, but the journey of it, can be interesting. While Rayya is a sweet girl taught by her parents for never knowing dating different with Nabil who always been a Casanova. While Mansur, Rayyas father, doesnt want Nabil to rely on his father wealth to support their lives later. Sound as a challenge for Nabil to proves his true love to Rayya.

As Chi-ho and Cheung Wai become further involved, Szeto and Mei-ting team up to dismantle the powerful syndicate behind these crimes.

programme.title: Billionaire Story

programme.title: Axian Small Town Foodcation

programme.title: Call Me By Fire 4
programme.desc: In this season, the show takes a fresh twist by inviting 34 diverse guests, who are divided into the Older Brothers and Younger Brothers teams. programme.title: Tenerife 2, Spain

programme.title: Aberdeenshire

programme.title: Nagaland, Kohima

programme.title: Mauritius 1
programme.desc: Sun sand and a whole lot of fun- Mauritius spells frolic and a non-stop blast! The clear blue sea, the white sparkling sands and the sun kissing your skin, Mauritius is what dreams are made of.

programme.title: Cork, Ireland
programme.desc: Alex explores Cork, starting with traditional food, visiting Fota Wildlife Park and then the Blarney castle. Further explores Cork butter museum, ending with a visit to Cork City Gaol.

programme.title: Sarovar Premier, Kerala
programme.desc: Keralas Sarovar Premier spa retreat is known for its Ayurvedic spa therapies, offering treatments based on the natural principles of healing and bringing ones mind, body and spirit in equilibrium.

programme.title: Mr Ks strange Christmas
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever theyre needed sorting out inhabitants problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: Heres an armadillo
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, shes able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Old ghosts
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: The Kidizz, feel great in the skin theyre in
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Ants in their pants
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: The punishment
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy whos curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: Alchemy
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: God and the toad
programme.desc: God and the toad are the best of friends. As a tribute to their friendship, God gives the toad every power. But the toad becomes arrogant and pitiless, eventually defying God himself.

programme.title: The music master
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Screams on the high seas
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, its a busy programme for everyone. But itll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours
programme.desc: 7 jours, a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, Falò discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde Lhebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... Objectif Monde LHebdo, a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Weekly summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables dOlonne.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote dAzur.

programme.title: #Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerlands most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Sun (China)
programme.desc: Business school student, Sun Ruijun arrived in France at 22 and began training as a pastry chef with Alain Ducasse before joining the Paul Bocuse Institute. The chef today heads the Lyon restaurant La Table Wei, where she offers French-Asian fusion cuisine.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques
programme.desc: The first major cultural magazine for the French-speaking world, an original TV5MONDE concept, 400 millions de critiques (400 million critics) reviews French-speaking cultural news through the viewpoints of Belgian, Swiss, Canadian, Quebecker, and French journalists.

programme.title: An investigation into the land that feeds us
programme.desc: Frances soil is dry, crumbly and no longer teeming with living mini-beasts and micro-organisms. The cause: intensive farming. According to the European Soil Institute 80% of agricultural land is degraded and water reserves polluted. Everywhere, those who work the land are fighting to change farming practices.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables dOlonne.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. Tendance XXI showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: Arts and crafts special
programme.desc: The apartments of Louis XVs intendants in the Hotel de la Marine. Between art and interior decoration, designer Ingrid Donat blends style and material to perfection. Alexander McQueen: a personality expressed through mystical romanticism. Between poetry and transparency: Atelier Stokowski, or the adventure of three brothers, master glassworkers.

programme.title: Pain perdu
programme.desc: On todays menu: pain perdu (bread pudding) with pistachios and hazelnuts.

programme.title: Internationales
programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Taratata 100% Live
programme.desc: For almost 90 minutes, watch the greatest names on the French and international music scene appear one after the other. Unexpected duets and trios, first-time covers, new talents... Taratata 100% live has all the ingredients that have made it a success, with even more live performances.

programme.desc: In his youth, Miu Tin encountered bride-to-be Koo Sun-Yuet, who has lingered in his mind ever since. Twenty years later, the two meet again.

Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17)
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: The Sky is the Limit
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple

programme.title: Chop Chop Show
programme.desc: The show invites younger generations to talk about relationship, career, entertainment, current affairs, and all the other popular topics that they care and complain about.

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: From makeup, skincare, hairstyle, clothing, horoscopes, parenting, to travel, all kinds of fashion-related topics are presented in the program. Pauline Lan leads dozens of professionals and experts across categories to offer the best fashion insights and tips.

programme.title: Battle ATM
programme.desc: Creating a brand-new interactive ATM that combined with puzzle solving and daily life! Guests can win money by taking three rounds of intellectual challenges from the ATM, turn wisdom into money!

programme.title: Super Taste: Go Go! Two- Day Trip
programme.desc: Super Taste focuses on funny travel style to discover destinations and local-dishes. Standing on audiences view point, programs hosts introduce every sightseeing sites with close-witness, young and humorous way to announce the spirits of Super Taste.

programme.title: Focus World News
programme.desc: A news programme that provides the latest international and Taiwan news, as well as in-depth analyses of important issues around the world.

programme.title: All About Health
programme.desc: How well do you know your body? What should you eat to be healthy and energetic? Are health tips available online reliable? Tune in to this programme as the hosts give you all the answers!

programme.title: (PG)Episode 3(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: A continuation of Kalyaanam 2 Kaathal Season 1. The story will expand with more conflicts and involvement of new characters along the way. Get ready to experience another roller coaster ride filled with emotions and romance.

programme.title: Episode 6(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Satya struggles to accept her postpartum body and keeps Indra at arms length as he tries to rekindle their romance. Things get awkward when her mother-in-law intervenes. Real-life couples speak candidly about keeping the flame alive after children. A marriage counsellor shares expert advice on how couples can maintain intimacy even with a co-sleeping arrangement.

programme.title: (PG)Episode 19(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: A newspaper unit undergoes upheaval when it transits from print to digital. This change parallels the journey of the staff who find themselves at the crossroads, grappling with the challenges that life throws at them.

programme.title: Episode 37(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Super Samayal is back for its 5th season. In this season, we will have 4 different chefs who will focus on different types of cooking and techniques.

programme.title: (PG)Episode 20(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Anjali questions Ravi about his actions; what is Ravi going to say? Arjun requests something from Anjali. Will she accommodate to Arjuns request?

programme.title: (PG)Episode 21(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Satya informs Priya about his suspicion on why they did not get the project. What is Priya going to do? Keerthy has started working with Anbu. Will she face any issues at work or with Prakash? Rathi and Vinod are still trying to solve their differences. What is going to happen to their relationship?

programme.title: (PG)Episode 27(English/Tamil Subtitles)
programme.desc: Nilachoru (Moonrice) is an imaginary food that mothers will feed their kids when their young - pointing to the moon and feeding the rice. Saravanan does the same for his sisters as he had been the parent figure in their lives. Every now and then, they will all gather at Saralas open terrace and have nilachoru and reminisce their childhood.

Through the series they learn a lot about each other and create something new that is enjoyed by both the locals and migrants. They are the Tag Team.
